quest0002.title: Get through the gatekeeper
quest0002.summary: Bob the gatekeeper of Hero's Hometown likes nothing more than to make a few extra bucks while on the job. It does not make him very likeable or trustworthy with the local townspeople.

2.taskPhrase: Bribe Bob the gatekeeper at Hero's Hometown

quest0004.title: Secret love
quest0004.summary: William is so anxious for a girl he secretly loves. He even ran away from her when he saw her just now.

1.taskPhrase: Find the girl Sarah and tell her about William's feelings

2.taskPhrase: Report back to William about how Sarah replied

quest0005.title: Buying salvation
quest0005.summary: Charles is dying and he is afraid to go to hell. He believes that the priest of Hero's Hometown can help him to not go to hell.

1.taskPhrase: Deliver exclusive present to the priest
